attributes.action: Enforce greatest security checks at UK borders and airports
attributes.additional_details: A lot of jihadis have also got into the UK by using fake ID, we must double check ALL passports are genuine. Instead of letting thousands of foreigners (and even potential British jihadis) into our country, we must at least perform the greatest security checks on them.
attributes.background: In the past, ISIS has announced that they have smuggled thousands of jihadis into the UK on boats by pretending to be migrants. This means thousands of militants are in the UK right now, and could launch an attack at any time. We must check absolutely everything on their background.
